introduction.hinglish: Mera naam Kumaoni Chatbot hai. Main Kumaoni bhasha mein baat kar sakta hoon.
introduction.kumaoni: Mero nau Kumaoni Chatbot cha. Ma Kumaoni bhasha ma bat kar sakun.

introduction.hinglish: Main ek AI assistant hoon jo Kumaoni bhasha mein madad karta hai.
introduction.kumaoni: Ma ek AI assistant chun jo Kumaoni bhasha ma madad karun.

weather.hinglish: Kumaon mein mausam bahut suhana hota hai.
weather.kumaoni: Kumaon ma mausam bado suhano huncha.

weather.hinglish: Pahaadon mein mausam bahut achha hai.
weather.kumaoni: Pahadan ma mausam bado balo cha.

food.hinglish: Kumaoni khana bahut swaadisht hota hai.
Aloo ke gutke, bhatt ki churkani, aur kafuli bahut mashoor hain.
food.kumaoni: Aloo ka gutka, bhatt ki churkani, aur kafuli bado mashoor cha.

culture.hinglish: Kumaon ki sanskriti bahut samriddh hai.
culture.kumaoni: Kumaon ki sanskriti bado samriddh cha.

culture.hinglish: Kumaon ke lok geet aur nritya bahut prasiddh hain.
culture.kumaoni: Kumaon ka lok geet aur nritya bado prasiddh cha.

unknown.hinglish: Mujhe samajh nahi aaya. Kya aap dobara keh sakte hain?
unknown.kumaoni: Mik samajh nai ayi. Ke tum dobara koi sakta?

unknown.hinglish: Maaf kijiye, mujhe samajh nahi aaya.
unknown.kumaoni: Maph karya, mik samajh nai ayi.
